item.title: Amani add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Amani add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Anyone whose goal is 'something higher' must expect someday to suffer vertigo. What is vertigo? Fear of falling? No, Vertigo is something other than fear of falling. It is the voice of the emptiness below us which tempts and lures us, it is the desire to fall, against which, terrified, we defend ourselves." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Amani add a quote by Ralph Ellison
item.description: "America is woven of many strands. I would recognise them and let it so remain. Our fate is to become one, and yet many." -- Ralph Ellison
